task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 25°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will first look up to find the roof.
I have seen the top of the building, and now I need to look down to see the base to get a sense of the full height.

Having seen both the top and the bottom of the building, I can now estimate its height; it appears to be about 5 stories tall, and assuming each story is approximately 3 meters, the total height is around 15 meters.
